Uses of Class
main.algorithm.Algorithm

  • Packages that use Algorithm 
    Package Description
    main.algorithm  
    main.node  
    main.tree  

    • Uses of Algorithm in main.algorithm

      Subclasses of Algorithm in main.algorithm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Entropy
      This class extends from the Algorithm class and uses the Entropy/Information Gain algorithm to create a decision node for a decision tree from a dataList.
      class  Gini
      This class extends from the Algorithm class and uses the Gini algorithm to create a decision node for a decision tree from a dataList.

    • Uses of Algorithm in main.node

      Constructors in main.node with parameters of type Algorithm 
      Constructor and Description
      Leaf(java.lang.String classification, Algorithm a)
      Creates a new leaf with some classification string, and gives it an algorithm to use when making new nodes.

    • Uses of Algorithm in main.tree

      Constructors in main.tree with parameters of type Algorithm 
      Constructor and Description
      DecisionTree(Algorithm a)
      Constructs a DecisionTree and prepares it to be trained.
